resources.string: Pick and drop facility is arranged between Airport and The Taj Gateway Hotel. Bus will be available at Hotel for Naya Raipur Tour.\n\nPlease contact the person below for any other transport related queries:

The Taj Gateway Hotel GE Road Raipur
G E Road, Behind Magneto Mall 
 Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492006,India

Tel: +91 771 6661000
Fax: +91 33 666111

Chhattisgarh is centrally located and well connected with rest of the country through road, rail and air. Raipur is the capital and the largest city, very Cosmopolitan in nature having Unique Knowledge Hub – IIM, IIIT, NIT, and AIIMS. The state is rich in mineral reserves, Land & Water, and one of the top states having surplus power extending excellent industrial climate for nurturing businesses.

New Statehood has given the opportunity to establish a new capital called Naya Raipur, India’s 21st Century smart city. A wide range of incentives have been announced to promote businesses under its Industrial/Electronics & IT Policy. The state has recognized Nurturing IT Talent by setting up of a stimulating Incubation/Startup Environment and Policy Support as the key enablers for the growth of the IT ecosystem within the state.
